title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Designing Quality Assessment and Improvement for Online Science Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Evaluate the engagement level of online science lectures with over 70% accuracy using the 30 indicators of the IELO framework.
Learners can propose and apply at least three strategies for designing online lectures to enhance learner engagement.
A science content evaluation system optimized for smartphone environments can be developed and validated.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
